T02TD1995E:190b-4: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi tshogs kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba /
T02TD1995E:190b-5: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1995E:190b-6: dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid gtso //
T02TD1995E:190b-7: dang por rdo rje sems la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02TD1995E:190b-8: 'dod pa thams cad rab stsol ba //
T02TD1995E:190b-9: tshogs kyi 'khor lo bdag gis bshad //
T02TD1995E:190b-10: sngags pa mchog tu rtog med pas //
T02TD1995E:190b-11: dus kun du ni mnyam par gzhag / rgyud kun gyi ni rjes 'brang shes //
T02TD1995E:190b-12: de nyid bcu ni mchog tu rig / zab cing rgya che chos rnams la //
T02TD1995E:190b-13: yid ni dal bar gyur ba dang //
T02TD1995E:190b-14: nga rgyal med pa'i slob ma rnams //
T02TD1995E:190b-15: legs par thos 'dod dang rnams la //
T02TD1995E:190b-16: tshogs kyi lha ni yongs rdzogs pas //
T02TD1995E:190b-18: dben zhing nyams dga'i khang pa ru //
T02TD1995E:190b-19: der ni rang gis mchod pa brtsam //
T02TD1995E:190b-20: rnal 'byor rgan pa'i rim pa yis //
T02TD1995E:190b-21: phyag dang mchod pa bya bar grags //
T02TD1995E:191a-2: / mgron po yin phyir gus pa dang //
T02TD1995E:191a-3: khrus dang dri zhim gos dang ni //
T02TD1995E:191a-4: me tog phreng bas brgyan pa dang //
T02TD1995E:191a-5: mchod yon bdug pa ci nus pas //
T02TD1995E:191a-6: tshogs kyi 'khor lo brtsam par bya //
T02TD1995E:191a-7: las kyi rdo rje mnyam bzhag pas //
T02TD1995E:191a-8: 'di dag la ni bsang gtor bya //
T02TD1995E:191a-9: mdzod spu spyi bor thal sbyar nas //
T02TD1995E:191a-10: yan lag brgyad kyis phyag bya'o //
T02TD1995E:191a-11: rin chen snod sogs gtor ma gzhag / rgyal ba 'jig rten 'das la dbul //
T02TD1995E:191a-12: 'jig rten pa dang sngags lha la //
T02TD1995E:191a-13: de nyid rig pas mchod pa brtsam //
T02TD1995E:191a-14: rgyud kyi dgongs pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1995E:191a-15: padma'i snod du bdud rtsi che //
T02TD1995E:191a-16: lcags kyu bcu ni yang dag bzlas //
T02TD1995E:191a-17: de dag thams cad tshim par bya //
T02TD1995E:191a-18: thun mong kun gyi mchod pa dang //
T02TD1995E:191a-19: kun la gsang ba mchog gi mchod //
T02TD1995E:191a-20: bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gnas //
T02TD1995E:191a-21: tshogs kyi gtso bo 'jug par bya //
T02TD1995E:191a-22: bu mo dal ba tshang zhing zhal gyi padma'i mgo bo smad //
T02TD1995E:191a-23: yon tan chen po shin tu rgyas shing de nyid yang dag rig par rung ba nyid //
T02TD1995E:191a-24: sems kyi rnam rtog bral zhing rgyan rnams kun dang ldan //
T02TD1995E:191a-25: nu ma gnyis ni mchog tu rgyas pas bdud rtsi'i snod ni de yis 'bul //
T02TD1995E:191a-26: rang byung ye shes me 'bar bas //
T02TD1995E:191a-28: khar ni de nyid sbyin sreg phyir ;
T02TD1995E:191a-29: / ro la sogs pa dbab par bya //
T02TD1995E:191a-30: de nas snying ga'i zla dkyil sar //
T02TD1995E:191a-31: thig le'i lha ni mnga' bdag che //
T02TD1995E:191a-32: yang na rang gi 'dod sogs lha //
T02TD1995E:191a-34: ming med thig les thig le ste //
T02TD1995E:191a-35: de nyid bsrung bsrubs 'od zer can //
T02TD1995E:191a-36: lce yi rtse la nyung zad dgod //
T02TD1995E:191a-37: bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis tshim bya'o //
T02TD1995E:191a-38: lte ba'i 'khor lo n'a da las //
T02TD1995E:191a-39: byung bas de yi ro bkug nas //
T02TD1995E:191a-40: lan gsum du ni 'thungs nas su //
T02TD1995E:191a-41: rnal 'byor pa de bde bar gnas //
T02TD1995E:191a-42: bi mu ma ra shu da ha na go ku panytsa kam / rgyud dang rgyud gzhan brjod pa yi //
T02TD1995E:191a-43: gzhan yang bdud rtsi chen po rnams //
T02TD1995E:191a-44: bar snang du ni gnas pa la //
T02TD1995E:191a-45: kun la mdzub gtor byin par bya //
T02TD1995E:191a-46: dpa' bos dpa' bo'i lha dang ni //
T02TD1995E:191a-47: lha mo kun gyi tshogs la gsal //
T02TD1995E:191a-48: lcags kyu bcu yi de nyid ni //
T02TD1995E:191a-49: thogs nas sbyin bdag sems dag phyir //
T02TD1995E:191a-50: ji ltar rigs par rtogs nas ni //
T02TD1995E:191b-0: phyi rol lha la dbul @191b bar bya ;
T02TD1995E:191b-1: / sems can rnams la sangs rgyas nyid //
T02TD1995E:191b-2: kun gyi snying rje'i stobs kyis bsgrub //
T02TD1995E:191b-3: rdo rje dril bu ldan pas bstod //
T02TD1995E:191b-4: 'khor los sgyur la bstod par bya //
T02TD1995E:191b-5: sgeg pa'i tshul gyis ster ba dang //
T02TD1995E:191b-6: mchod rdzas kyi ni snod dag rnams //
T02TD1995E:191b-7: so so'am kun la gcig tu'o //
T02TD1995E:191b-8: dag dang ma dag spyad mi bya //
T02TD1995E:191b-9: ji ltar 'dod pa'i bza' dang btung ba rnams //
T02TD1995E:191b-10: mchod pa sna tshogs mang po yis //
T02TD1995E:191b-11: rdo rje can gyis mchod pa yin //
T02TD1995E:191b-12: ci bde ji ltar 'dod par gsol //
T02TD1995E:191b-13: de ltar seng ge bzhin du dogs med rtogs bral bas //
T02TD1995E:191b-14: srid zhi'i go 'phang de nyid gnas pas bde bar ldan //
T02TD1995E:191b-15: rang gi yid 'ong ke shi ka la sogs pa'i glu //
T02TD1995E:191b-16: rgyal ba ma lus tshogs la gar gyis kyang ni mchod par bya //
T02TD1995E:191b-17: snod ni gang gis lag par gzhag / gar gyi lag pas gzung bar bya //
T02TD1995E:191b-18: mi shes pa'am rmongs pa yis //
T02TD1995E:191b-19: smod par gyur na chad pa thob //
T02TD1995E:191b-20: lus ngag yid kyi las kyis ni //
T02TD1995E:191b-21: la la dul bar ma gyur na //
T02TD1995E:191b-22: chad pas de ni zhi ba'i phyir //
T02TD1995E:191b-23: de yis ji ltar rigs par brtag / lag pa gnyis kyi phyag rgya yis //
T02TD1995E:191b-24: de nyid gtso bo'i cho ga bzhin //
T02TD1995E:191b-25: phan tshun du ni tshim par bya //
T02TD1995E:191b-26: sgeg dang rtse ba'i ro yis bde //
T02TD1995E:191b-27: zab dang rgya che'i gtam brjod cing //
T02TD1995E:191b-28: de nyid brtson pas mchod par bya //
T02TD1995E:191b-29: glu dang rnga sogs gar gyis ni //
T02TD1995E:191b-30: thabs dang shes rab bde ba'i mchog / phan tshun du ni mnyam par gus //
T02TD1995E:191b-31: dam tshig nyan par shin tu 'dod //
T02TD1995E:191b-32: pha rol phyin bcu sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1995E:191b-33: brtul zhugs can gyis mchod sbyin bya //
T02TD1995E:191b-35: sngon du bzod gsol 'gro bar bya //
T02TD1995E:191b-36: bya ba byas nas blo ldan gyis //
T02TD1995E:191b-37: de nas phyag byas 'jug par bya //
T02TD1995E:191b-38: rtag tu rnal 'byor bdag nyid dang //
T02TD1995E:191b-39: rtag tu de nyid lam la zhugs //
T02TD1995E:191b-40: rtag tu 'dul bar ldan pa yin //
T02TD1995E:191b-41: tshogs kyi 'khor lo rtag tu bya //
T02TD1995E:191b-42: sbyin pa'i zas sbyin pa rnams la //
T02TD1995E:191b-43: phyag rgya thun mong du ni brjod //
T02TD1995E:191b-44: de phyir grol bar 'dod pa yis //
T02TD1995E:191b-45: bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya //
T02TD1995E:191b-46: ji srid rang gi bde 'dod pas //
T02TD1995E:191b-47: 'di nyid rol dang sgeg pa yis //
T02TD1995E:191b-48: de srid phyag rgyan lhan cig tu //
T02TD1995E:191b-49: gnyug ma 'di yis mchod par bya //
T02TD1995E:191b-50: mig la sogs pa'i thabs chen gyis //
T02TD1995E:192a-0: @192a * // gzugs sogs rdo rje ma yi tshogs //
T02TD1995E:192a-1: rnam shes rnams kyi bde chen po //
T02TD1995E:192a-2: phyi rol gyi ni rtag tu 'jug / rdo rje padma'i 'od zer gyis //
T02TD1995E:192a-4: rgyal ba'i tshogs kyi 'od zer 'byung bas rang bzhin med par rang bzhin can //
T02TD1995E:192a-5: shin tu bde ba mchog tu 'phags pas yid du 'ong ba'i shes rab bka' nyan las //
T02TD1995E:192a-6: dag pa'i lce yis len byed sems can de ni rdo rje sems //
T02TD1995E:192a-7: de nas gshegs gsol thob pa na //
T02TD1995E:192a-8: bkra shis klu dang lha kun la //
T02TD1995E:192a-9: tshogs kyi 'khor lo mngon byas nas //
T02TD1995E:192a-10: yon bdag mgo la me tog gzhag / bkra shis brjod la sdom pa sbyar //
T02TD1995E:192a-11: 'byung po thams cad sangs rgyas su //
T02TD1995E:192a-12: bla na med par smon lam gdab //
T02TD1995E:192a-13: lhag ma'i gtor mas tshim par bya //
T02TD1995E:192a-14: gtor ma chen po yang dag bsdus //
T02TD1995E:192a-15: chos bdag ye shes gyur nas ni //
T02TD1995E:192a-16: blo dang ldan pas dge la sbyar //
T02TD1995E:192a-17: mtho gang tsam gyi mtho ba ru //
T02TD1995E:192a-18: rgyal ba chos kyi gzhi bsam bya //
T02TD1995E:192a-19: de las bdud rtsi rgyun 'dzag pa //
T02TD1995E:192a-20: rang nyid la ni bsam par bya //
T02TD1995E:192a-21: yungs kar tsam gyi phra ba ni //
T02TD1995E:192a-22: rdo rje can gyi mtshan ma ste //
T02TD1995E:192a-23: rdo rje rtse'am sna rtser bsam //
T02TD1995E:192a-24: brtan par gyur nas spro bar bya //
T02TD1995E:192a-25: snying ga'i dkyil ni nam mkha' la //
T02TD1995E:192a-26: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa ste //
T02TD1995E:192a-27: der ni chos kyi 'byung gnas gnas //
T02TD1995E:192a-28: phra mo'i rdo rje rtag tu dran //
T02TD1995E:192a-29: rdo rje la sogs ro dang ldan //
T02TD1995E:192a-30: yid kyi rang bzhin rnam thar gsum //
T02TD1995E:192a-31: rnam pa kun gyi don dag la //
T02TD1995E:192a-32: 'gyur ba med pa'i bde ba che //
T02TD1995E:192a-33: thabs dang shes rab rnal 'byor dag / las kun la ni thams cad du //
T02TD1995E:192a-34: yang dag byang chub legs sems gzugs //
T02TD1995E:192a-35: de nyid brtson pas bsam par bya //
T02TD1995E:192a-36: sngags ni srog gi yi ge bzlas //
T02TD1995E:192a-37: thig le'i rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //
T02TD1995E:192a-38: chos dang chos min las grol ba //
T02TD1995E:192a-39: rtag tu yongs su bsgom par bya ;
T02TD1995E:192a-40: / de yis dus sam thams cad du //
T02TD1995E:192a-41: grol ba'i lam la brtson pa yis //
T02TD1995E:192a-42: rtag pa'i dus su bsgom byas na //
T02TD1995E:192a-43: de yis grol thob phun sum tshogs //
T02TD1995E:192a-44: 'gro ba rnams kyi bsam pa sbyin pa la sogs kun gyis myur du yongs rdzogs nas //
T02TD1995E:192b-0: bdag med rdo rje la sogs @192b kyis ni rnam rtog rmongs pa'i grong khyer thams cad brtag byas nas //
T02TD1995E:192b-1: rgyal ba'i 'khor lo gang zhig bskor bas bla ma'i ye shes 'char zhing thar pa ster byed pa //
T02TD1995E:192b-2: 'phags pa de yi thugs rje chen pos nad rnams rtag par shin tu grol bar byed //
T02TD1995E:192b-3: zab pa'i tshogs kyis yon tan gter ldan pas ;
T02TD1995E:192b-4: / rnam par rtog pa'i rtog pa las rgyal nyon mongs spangs pa yi //
T02TD1995E:192b-5: bag chags bcas pa'i gnas las grol zhing rnam grol ba'i //
T02TD1995E:192b-6: dngos dang dngos med rnam grol rnal 'byor pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1995E:192b-7: yan lag rgyan rnams kyis ni rnam par brgyan pa yi //
T02TD1995E:192b-8: nam mkha' zla ba'i 'od zer cha ni rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa gang //
T02TD1995E:192b-9: shes rab tshogs kyi bdag nyid la ni phyag 'tshal 'dud //
T02TD1995E:192b-10: 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das bcas bla ma'i 'khor lo can //
T02TD1995E:192b-11: bsgom bya rnam par bsgoms pas 'gro ba grol ba'i phyir //
T02TD1995E:192b-12: gang zhig phan pa'i bsam pas 'dir ni dkyil 'khor byed pa yi //
T02TD1995E:192b-13: tshogs kyi 'khor lo byed pa de la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
T02TD1995E:192b-14: sems can thams cad la gnas dri med dngos po yi //
T02TD1995E:192b-15: bsgoms pas gsal bar gyur pa'i bde chen bsdus pa la //
T02TD1995E:192b-16: phyag rgya dang bcas byed pa de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1995E:192b-17: dpal ldan rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi tshogs kyi 'khor lo /
T02TD1995E:192b-18: slob dpon ratna a'a ka ra sh'antis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1995E:192b-20: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'di pam ka ra rakshi ta dang /
T02TD1995E:192b-21: lo ts'a ba dge slong rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba'o//
